# MenuPositionFunc delegate

```csharp
public delegate void MenuPositionFunc(IntPtr menu, ref int x, ref int y, out bool push_in, 
    IntPtr user_data);
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| menu | Transfer ownership: none |
| x | Transfer ownership: full |
| y | Transfer ownership: full |
| push_in | Transfer ownership: full |
| user_data | Transfer ownership: none; Nullable: true |

## Return Value

Transfer ownership: none
